nodes.text: Voryam Bhao was a young Human male who served as a member of the Moff Council during the Second Galactic Civil War. He is described as having a honey-colored complexion, curly black hair, and a "sneering upper lip just begging to be ripped off his face." Bhao was killed by a Mandalorian raiding party on Nickel One, along with Moff Krom Rethway, among others, during the Second Battle of Roche.
